user_description: You cannot change what you refuse to confront.
Whatever is worth doing is worth doing well.The moment you think about giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
Official Racing Driver at Virgin Red Bull Racing Renault Guess-F1 Team. An almost independent fan of almost anything!
The Big Pink,DIIV,TOY,Future Islands,The XX,Arctic Monkeys,Franz Ferdinand,Haim,Portugal.The man,Razorlight,LanaDel Rey,Vampire Weekend
Eager to create my own products.
